game.name: In the Raven Shadow
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: In the Raven Shadow is in the best sense an old-fashioned adventure game for all sense-seeking people.
game.shortDescriptionEn: In the Raven Shadow is in the best sense an old-fashioned adventure game for all sense-seeking people.

reviewHighlights.text: Funny story, perfect czech dubbing. Lots of fun.
Velmi stará adventura se skvělým dabingem, pokud máte rádi Lábuse. Občas dost praštěná a na konci i nesmyslně otravná v tom, kam přesně kliknout. Ale...
